hero.title: About Zeta English Academy
hero.tagline: Empowering Versatile Learners for a Global Future
hero.description: Discover how Zeta English Academy blends creativity, confidence, and communication to help every learner thrive.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Zeta English Academy, we believe learning should be fun, inspiring, and purposeful. We nurture students who are academically strong, confident communicators, and creative thinkers through a dynamic, learner-centered environment.
mission.spotlight: We empower versatile learners who are curious, confident, and ready to shine in any classroom.

philosophy.title: Our Educational Philosophy
philosophy.intro: We go beyond grammar drills and test prep. Zeta's curriculum is designed to:
points: Spark curiosity through guided reading labs.
Strengthen grammar and structure with clear, practical lessons.
Build confident speakers and critical thinkers through discussion, debate, and collaboration.
Encourage students to think, lead, and connect in English.

levels.title: Our Learning Levels
levels.description: A systematic progression across seven core levels aligns with international standards while supporting Korean academic goals.

items.title: Early Explorers
items.subtitle: Build the absolute foundations of English.
items.purpose: Build the absolute foundations of English.
items.coreSkills: Phonics, beginning spelling & vocabulary, first speaking skills.

items.title: Foundation Builders
items.subtitle: Move from decoding words to understanding full stories.
items.purpose: Move from decoding words to understanding full stories.
items.coreSkills: Early reading comprehension paired with writing short, detailed summaries of complete stories.

items.title: Knowledge Navigators
items.label: Lexile ≈ 250–500
items.subtitle: Transition into real chapter books.
items.coreSkills: Context-based vocabulary growth, sustained reading stamina, comprehension across chapters.

items.title: Skill Sharpeners
items.label: Lexile ≈ 600–700
items.subtitle: Tighten skills within a Lexile-guided track.
items.purpose: Tighten skills within a Lexile-guided track.
items.coreSkills: Increased reading volume, formal comprehension training, and holistic vocabulary study.

items.title: Advanced Learners
items.label: Lexile ≈ 660–950
items.subtitle: Tackle higher-level texts and ideas.
items.coreSkills: Ongoing comprehension and vocabulary work plus discussion of socially relevant topics woven into reading.

items.title: Critical Thinkers
items.label: Capstone
items.subtitle: Synthesize ideas across diverse materials.
items.coreSkills: Analytical reading, argument formation, and text-to-world connections across capstone materials.

items.title: Leadership Pathfinders
items.label: Capstone
items.subtitle: Turn mastery into clear, confident communication.
items.purpose: Turn mastery into clear, confident communication.
items.coreSkills: Presentation, collaboration, and applied English for real-world contexts.

levels.footnote: Each level develops reading fluency, vocabulary expansion, discussion-based learning, and comprehension.

writingProgram.title: Optional Writing Program
writingProgram.description: Students can enroll in Writing I, II, or III as a complementary track for deeper practice.

levels.title: Writing I
levels.description: Sentence structure, grammar fluency, and writing fundamentals.

levels.title: Writing II
levels.description: Paragraph construction, organization, and essay logic.

levels.title: Writing III
levels.description: Formal, academic writing with multi-paragraph essays.

writingProgram.note: Recommended for students preparing for middle school, international programs, or academic competitions.

globalPerspective.title: A Global Perspective, Locally Rooted
globalPerspective.description: While rooted in Korean educational excellence, Zeta's upper levels align with U.S. and international benchmarks so learners can excel in Korean high schools or overseas universities.

differentiators.title: What Makes Zeta Different?
items: Structured progression by skill level and Lexile band
Small class sizes with individualized coaching
Emphasis on creativity, confidence, and communication
Debate, discussion, and real-world English practice
Optional writing courses for extra challenge

testimonial.quote: Zeta is not just about learning English. It's about learning how to express who I am.
testimonial.name: Cindy
testimonial.subtitle: Student for 4 years

cta.title: Ready to Join Us?
cta.description: Zeta is a launchpad for academic and personal growth. Let's build a plan tailored to your child.
